properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 4:09PM AKST until February 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 55 below occuring. Snow and
blowing snow expected Saturday night into Monday. Plan on
difficult travel conditions. Storm total snow accumulations of 4
inches are expected. Visibility will be reduced to one half mile
or less at times Saturday night through Sunday night.

* WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow. Dangerously cold wind chills
to 55 below below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
